title: Miley's bum flag and Tinchy Stryder's Chuckle Bros selfie â today's pop culture LIVE | Culture | The Guardian
summary: celebrities get fined for the weirdest things .

documents.title: ta-ra for now
text: follow the bears .
2 bears that 's us we 'll be back on monday with more pop culture gubbins .
for now , if you 're off home and a tube journey awaits : here 's our feature on dance duo the 2 bears and their guide to their favourite ever clubs .
and here 's our uk-wide guide to the best clubs and parties this weekend .

documents.title: the new issue has landed !
text: here 's a sneak peek at what 's inside your tip-top guide tomorrow .

for those who prefer text rather than images , that 's a cover story on itv2 's plebs and going on-set in bulgaria , bjork , chris cunningham and more on the cult of aphex twin , a guide to the 2 bears favourite club nights , how indie labels are replacing musicians with comedians , and everything you ever needed to know about friends .

documents.title: celebrities get fined for the weirdest things
text: booty is only skin deep .
sierra/epa ah yes , the miley bit of the blog has arrived .

in today 's miley news according to spin a mexican lawman is trying to get the singer fined after one of her dancers waved the national flag on her behind during an independence day performance in monterrey .
trashing a hotel is so johnny depp and kate moss in the mid-90s .
these days you need to get a bit more creative with your bad behaviour .
just look at j-bieb , getting fined for throwing eggs at his neighbour 's house .
or this poor thai celebrity who claims he was fined for doing the ice bucket challenge .
or¦ deeply regretting doing this news post in order to get hits .
quick , look , the zoolander sequel !

documents.title: something for the weekend
text: here 's some new music !
secondcity the rising house producer knows how to have some fun with some post-its at work .
gorgon city the duo have remixed jessie ware 's kind of¦ sometimes¦ lately and made it all burbly and lovely .
girl band here 's something far gnarlier by dublin 's angular punkers girl band .
release the anger and frustration .

ryan adams and johnny depp we have reason to believe that the guy in the fedora swinging his guitar from side to side is johnny depp and that he joined ryan adams onstage for a cover of danzig 's mother .
oceaã¡n a new , dubsteppy slowburner by young producer oceaã¡n , which was premiered on sohn 's radio 1 show last night .

documents.title: a post-lunch chuckle
text: oh , look !
it 's aziz ansari being all funny , which is handy , because he 's coming to london soon to be all funny in your face .
to the hammersmith apollo on 30 november , to be exact .
and just a wee plug here 's our interview from last year with the parks and recs funny guy .
funny , right ?

documents.title: # reviewanything it 's here
text: we literally review anything .
shaw/the guide behold , it 's another review anything , where we 've taken your submissions to task , from new music to visual haikus , whatever that is .
get stuck in !

documents.title: fold your face like aphex
text: aphex , folded .

records inspired by aphex twin 's new press shot which itself was inspired by internet meme kemp folds the guardian music team have given a load of famous faces an aphex-style makeover for you to guess and waste at least 5 mins of your lunch break .
want to waste a bit more ?
send us your own folded faces .
you can use the app on pitchfork 's aphex feature to do so .
look , so pretty¦ k-phex twin .
jonze

documents.title: oh dear , oh dear
text: could this be the best and unlikeliest musical collabo since metallica and lou reed ?
or ozzy osbourne and miss piggy ?
yes .
yes it could .
this clip of telly duo the chuckle brothers and grime rapper tinchy stryder in the studio is rocking our worlds .
apparently they have been laying down some stuff in the studio maybe the to me , to you line over a sick beat you 've always wanted .
maybe you 'll catch them finger-pointing their way around butterz 's grime roller disco in east london on saturday ?
we 'll update you with the full news story from guardian music later today .

documents.title: pulled apart by forces ?
text: yvette fielding ( @ yfielding ) @ pulledhorses @ twitterid @ twitterid defo !
you are fantastic and look true ghost hunters .
let 's do it !

x in what must be one of the finest internet auditions for a telly programme we 've seen all week , pulled apart by horses the self-styled ghostbusters of uk heavy rock have put themselves forward for most haunted .
and yvette fielding is into it .
we reckon they 'd take to ghost hunting like ravenous cave men to a dead boar , if their top five horror soundtracks are anything to go by .

just for fun , here 's the time that shaun ryder soiled himself while stuck in a haunted room¦ and mcfly¦ and here 's girls aloud 's screamy seance in which cheryl cole pisses off the spirits from 33m58 .

documents.title: morning !
text: another day , another guide daily , making your friday go that little bit quicker .

we 've scoured the world of internets for pop culture 's say on scotland 's independence day last night and , well , glasgwegian producer rustie who also launched his brills new album , green language in london yesterday has spoken for the people .

rustie ( @ rustie ) scotland u fukin shitebagss luckily , his old crew luckyme are a bit more positive about the whole thing and are throwing a megarave tonight instead to celebrate being scottish and awesome .
luckyme ( @ luckyme ) world turns .
not 1 vote wasted nor minute of debate .
join us tonight for this blow out in glasgow .
whole crew .
- /paramount/sportsphoto ltd./allstar

bulletin.text: We're back with all the pop culture tidbits you ever wanted before the weekend.
Join us for new music, film trailers, fun and games oh, and #ReviewAnything, our weekly feature where your creative submissions get crushed under our critical boot.
